title: Beats Fit Pro see rare discount to $180 in Friday’s best deals, plus Native Union sale, more
content:
Heading into the weekend, all of the best Apple deals are now live with the Beats Fit Pro going on sale for one of the first times at $180. That’s alongside a 20% off Native Union Apple accessory sale and ecobee HomeKit SmartThermostats from $149. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Beats Fit Pro see rare discount to $180 in Friday’s best deals, plus Native Union sale, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: All of this weekend's best Apple deals are now headlined by Beats Fit Pro going on sale for some of the first times at $180.
